subject: X Games
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: While many of his competitors fell as a result of snow and winds, Shaun White had a nearly flawless, stylish run to win the halfpipe final at the Winter X Games.
snippet: While many of his competitors fell as a result of snow and winds, Shaun White had a nearly flawless, stylish run to win the halfpipe final at the Winter X Games.
